name: CraneDestroyer
description:
It's year 2369, and Sagrada Familia's construction is still not finished. You are the one chosen to go to the past and resurrect Gaudí to take him to the present and finish Sagrada Familia's construction. But be carefull, his enemies won't let you resurrect him.

Your mission: Enter Sagrada  Familia, kill all the enemies and find the secret button to the cript.

Controls

Move: WASD.

Aim: Mouse right click.

Shoot: Mouse left click.

C: crouch.

E: interact. 

Q: Next dialogue.

Developed by CapybaraStudios

-Victor Falcon

-Sofia Liles

-Laura Isidro

-Pol Farreras
